languages.text: "А миссионер говорил, что души всех, кто против Чорда, будут после смерти гнить".
"And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."
languages.original_text: "А миссионер говорил, что души всех, кто против Чорда, будут после смерти гнить".

traits.locale_text: "And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."
"And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."
"And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."
"And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."
"And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."
"And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."

languages.text: “传教士说，所有才对库尔达的人，死了之后灵魂都会腐烂。”
languages.original_text: "And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."

traits.locale_text: “传教士说，所有才对库尔达的人，死了之后灵魂都会腐烂。”

languages.text: 「チョーダに反対する者の魂は死後腐敗すると、聖務団が言っていた」
languages.original_text: "And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダに反対する者の魂は死後腐敗すると、聖務団が言っていた」

languages.text: «Y el misionero dijo que el alma de quien esté contra Chorda se pudrirá después de morir».
languages.original_text: "And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."

traits.locale_text: «Y el misionero dijo que el alma de quien esté contra Chorda se pudrirá después de morir».

languages.text: "Und der Missionar sagte, die Seele aller, die sich gegen Chorda stellen, werden nach ihrem Tod verrotten."
languages.original_text: "And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."

traits.locale_text: "Und der Missionar sagte, die Seele aller, die sich gegen Chorda stellen, werden nach ihrem Tod verrotten."

languages.text: « Le missionnaire a dit que les âmes de ceux qui s'opposaient à Chorda se gangrèneraient dans la mort. »
languages.original_text: "And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."

traits.locale_text: « Le missionnaire a dit que les âmes de ceux qui s'opposaient à Chorda se gangrèneraient dans la mort. »

languages.text: "Sonra misyoner dedi ki... Chorda'ya her kim karşı çıkarsa ruhu, öldükten sonra çürüyecekmiş."
languages.original_text: "And the missionary said the soul of whoever's against Chorda will rot after they die."

traits.locale_text: "Ve misyoner dedi ki, Chorda'ya karşı çıkan her kim olursa olsun, ruhu öldükten sonra çürüyecekmiş."
